author: Greg Caldecott
content:
Not a huge vessel full of crude oil as initially reported, quite small these days and empty. Why? she had just come from Nigeria! and why Southampton, to load crude??? Also stopped briefly at Las Palmas Why?
Years ago when I was towing a vessel from Rumania to Norway we discovered stowaways on board the tow. On arrival in Norway the stowaways were deported back home, my company had to pay. Is this still the law?
